dcterms:description: The IWSLT 2018 Evaluation Campaign is a dataset used for evaluating machine translation systems, containing audio and text data for English and German.
dcterms:title: TED-derived English-German IWSLT18 corpus

dcterms:creator: Mattia Antonino Di Gangi
Roberto Dessé
Roldano Cattoni
Matteo Negri
Marco Turchi
dcterms:description: MuST-C is a multilingual speech translation corpus created from English TED Talks, containing audio recordings and corresponding manual transcriptions and translations.
dcterms:title: MuST-C

dcterms:creator: Mattia Antonino Di Gangi
Roberto Dessé
Roldano Cattoni
Matteo Negri
Marco Turchi
dcterms:description: The English-German subset of MuST-C is derived from the same TED Talks used to build the IWSLT18 corpus, containing audio and text data for English and German.
dcterms:title: English-German subset of MuST-C

dcterms:creator: Mattia Antonino Di Gangi
Roberto Dessé
Roldano Cattoni
Matteo Negri
Marco Turchi
dcterms:description: The Fisher and Callhome corpus is a widely used dataset for speech-to-text translation, containing audio recordings and corresponding transcriptions.
dcterms:title: Fisher and Callhome corpus

dcterms:creator: Mattia Antonino Di Gangi
Roberto Dessé
Roldano Cattoni
Matteo Negri
Marco Turchi
dcterms:description: The Griko-Italian corpus is a small dataset for speech translation, containing audio recordings and corresponding transcriptions in Italian.
dcterms:title: Griko-Italian corpus

dcterms:description: The IWSLT18 corpus is a widely used dataset for machine translation, containing audio and text data for various language pairs.
dcterms:title: IWSLT18 corpus
